# Introduction
## Data Awal

```{r}
data_head <-  head(data)
DT::datatable(data_head,extensions = 'FixedColumns',
              options = list(dom = 't',scrollX = TRUE,
                             fixedColumns = list(leftColumns = 1)))
```
Jika anda menghitungnya, maka tabel ini memiliki 78 kolom dan kira kira 91713 baris. 
```{r}
names(data)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data,aes(x=age,y=bmi,color=hospital_death)) + 
  geom_point() + ggtitle("Relation between Age and Bmi") +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = TRUE, option = "D")

```

install.packages("viridis")
